long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlackBird Inspector helps amazon sellers to find out best selling opportunities on amazon. It shows products potential's stats like number of sales, estimated revenue, # of review and ratings from each product etc... which could help amazon sellers to take decision on the product.Later on, Blackbird users will be able to add products directly into their BlackBird's products watcher list.
